## Leunbach test equating using R

This package aims to implement the Leunbach test equating procedures in
the software DIGRAM, written by Svend Kreiner. Both direct and indirect
equating is implemented.

The equating procedure is described in the [Additional file
1](https://link.springer.com/article/10.1186/s12874-019-0768-y#additional-information),
related to this article: Adroher, N. D., Kreiner, S., Young, C., Mills,
R., & Tennant, A. (2019). Test equating sleep scales: Applying the
Leunbachâ€™s model. BMC Medical Research Methodology, 19(1), 141.
<https://doi.org/10.1186/s12874-019-0768-y>

## Author

[Magnus Johansson](https://ki.se/en/people/magnus-johansson-3) is a
licensed psychologist with a PhD in behavior analysis. He works as a
research specialist at [Karolinska
Institutet](https://ki.se/en/cns/research/centre-for-psychiatry-research),
Department of Clinical Neuroscience, Center for Psychiatry Research.

- ORCID: [0000-0003-1669-592X](https://orcid.org/0000-0003-1669-592X)
- Bluesky:
  [@pgmj.bsky.social](https://bsky.app/profile/pgmj.bsky.social)
- Mastodon: [@pgmj@scicomm.xyz](https://scicomm.xyz/@pgmj)

# Package index

## All functions

- [`analyze_orbits()`](https://pgmj.github.io/leunbachR/reference/analyze_orbits.md)
  : Analyze Orbits for Leunbach Model
- [`diagnose_equating()`](https://pgmj.github.io/leunbachR/reference/diagnose_equating.md)
  : Diagnostic function for equating
- [`get_equating_table()`](https://pgmj.github.io/leunbachR/reference/get_equating_table.md)
  : Extract equating table with bootstrap confidence intervals
- [`get_indirect_equating_table()`](https://pgmj.github.io/leunbachR/reference/get_indirect_equating_table.md)
  : Get indirect equating table
- [`get_orbit()`](https://pgmj.github.io/leunbachR/reference/get_orbit.md)
  : Get orbit distribution for a specific total score
- [`leunbach_bootstrap()`](https://pgmj.github.io/leunbachR/reference/leunbach_bootstrap.md)
  : Parametric Bootstrap for Leunbach Model with Standard Error of
  Equating
- [`leunbach_equate()`](https://pgmj.github.io/leunbachR/reference/leunbach_equate.md)
  : Equate Scores Between Tests using Leunbach Model
- [`leunbach_indirect_bootstrap()`](https://pgmj.github.io/leunbachR/reference/leunbach_indirect_bootstrap.md)
  : Bootstrap for Indirect Equating
- [`leunbach_indirect_equate()`](https://pgmj.github.io/leunbachR/reference/leunbach_indirect_equate.md)
  : Indirect Equating via an Anchor Test
- [`leunbach_ipf()`](https://pgmj.github.io/leunbachR/reference/leunbach_ipf.md)
  : Estimate Leunbach Score Parameters using Iterative Proportional
  Fitting
- [`plot(`*`<leunbach_indirect_bootstrap>`*`)`](https://pgmj.github.io/leunbachR/reference/plot.leunbach_indirect_bootstrap.md)
  : Plot method for leunbach_indirect_bootstrap objects
- [`plot(`*`<leunbach_ipf>`*`)`](https://pgmj.github.io/leunbachR/reference/plot.leunbach_ipf.md)
  : Plot method for leunbach_ipf objects
- [`plot(`*`<leunbach_orbits>`*`)`](https://pgmj.github.io/leunbachR/reference/plot.leunbach_orbits.md)
  : Plot method for leunbach_orbits objects
- [`print(`*`<leunbach_bootstrap>`*`)`](https://pgmj.github.io/leunbachR/reference/print.leunbach_bootstrap.md)
  : Print method for leunbach_bootstrap objects
- [`print(`*`<leunbach_equating>`*`)`](https://pgmj.github.io/leunbachR/reference/print.leunbach_equating.md)
  : Print method for leunbach_equating objects
- [`print(`*`<leunbach_indirect>`*`)`](https://pgmj.github.io/leunbachR/reference/print.leunbach_indirect.md)
  : Print method for leunbach_indirect objects
- [`print(`*`<leunbach_indirect_bootstrap>`*`)`](https://pgmj.github.io/leunbachR/reference/print.leunbach_indirect_bootstrap.md)
  : Print method for leunbach_indirect_bootstrap objects
- [`print(`*`<leunbach_ipf>`*`)`](https://pgmj.github.io/leunbachR/reference/print.leunbach_ipf.md)
  : Print method for leunbach_ipf objects
- [`print(`*`<leunbach_orbits>`*`)`](https://pgmj.github.io/leunbachR/reference/print.leunbach_orbits.md)
  : Print method for leunbach_orbits objects
- [`summary(`*`<leunbach_indirect_bootstrap>`*`)`](https://pgmj.github.io/leunbachR/reference/summary.leunbach_indirect_bootstrap.md)
  : Summary method for leunbach_indirect_bootstrap objects
- [`summary(`*`<leunbach_ipf>`*`)`](https://pgmj.github.io/leunbachR/reference/summary.leunbach_ipf.md)
  : Summary method for leunbach_ipf objects
- [`summary(`*`<leunbach_orbits>`*`)`](https://pgmj.github.io/leunbachR/reference/summary.leunbach_orbits.md)
  : Summary method for leunbach_orbits objects
